countProcess.failReason.numbersOnly: This counting channel is in number-only mode.
countProcess.failReason.doubleCount: **You can't count two numbers in a row.**
countProcess.warning.wrongNumberAlreadyZ: Incorrect number! The next number is `1`. **No stats have been changed since the current number was 0.**
countProcess.warning.memberSaveUsed: ⚠ <@{authorId}> You have used **1** of your saves. You have **{savesLeft}** left. The next number is **{nextNumber}**
countProcess.warning.guildSaveUsed: ⚠ <@{authorId}> You have used **1** guild save! There are **{savesLeft}/2** guild saves left. The next number is **{nextNumber}**
countProcess.failAlert.embedDescription: Vote [here](https://counting.duckgroup.xyz/vote) to earn saves so you can continue counting next time. See `c!help`.
countProcess.failAlert.messageContent: <@{authorId}> RUINED IT AT **{number}**!! Next number is **1**. {failReason}
messageDeleted.messageContent: <@{memberId}> deleted their count of `{currentNumber}`. The next number is `{nextNumber}`.
commands.generic.error.missingAdministra: <@{authorId}> You must have `Administrator` permissions to use this command.
commands.generic.error.userNotFoundInDat: Specified user not found in database. (Not counted yet?)
commands.stats.embedField.global.name: Global
commands.stats.embedField.shard.name: This Shard (ID `{shardId}`)
commands.help.embedFooter: Made by Duck#0001, Maintained by tt2468#2468 | Guilds: {guilds:,d} | Uptime: {uptime:,d}s
commands.channel.content: <@{authorId}> The counting channel has been updated to this channel.
commands.user.embedField.global.name: Global Stats
commands.user.embedField.global.value:
Correct rate: **{correctRate}**
Total correct: **{totalCorrect:,d}**
Total incorrect: **{totalIncorrect:,d}**
Score: **{score:,d} (#{rank:,d})**
Saves: **{saves:g}/{saveSlots:g}**
commands.user.embedField.local.name: Stats in `{guildName}`
commands.user.embedField.local.value:
Correct rate: **{correctRate}**
Total correct: **{totalCorrect:,d}**
Total incorrect: **{totalIncorrect:,d}**
Last Active: **{lastActive}**
Highest Valid Count: **{highestCount:,d} ({highestCountTime})**
Saves Used: **{savesUsed:,d}**
commands.server.embedDescription:
Current Number: **{currentNumber:,d}**
Last counted by: <@{lastMember}>
Guild Saves: **{guildSaves}/2**
High Score: **{highScore:,d} ({highScoreTime})**
Rank: **{currentRank:,d}/{totalGuildEntries:,d}**
Saves Used: **{savesUsed:,d}**
Numbers Only Mode: **{numbersOnly}**
commands.donatesave.embedDescription:
`{donatedSaves}` of your saves have been donated to this guild, adding `{addedSaves}` to its saves, for a total of `{guildSaves}/2` guild saves. (1 Guild Save = 5 User Saves)

You have `{memberSaves}` saves left.
commands.donatesave.error.notEnoughSaves: You need to have at least `1` save in order to donate.
commands.donatesave.error.maxSavesReache: This guild already has the maximum amount of saves! (2)
commands.transfersave.embedDescription:
You have transferred `{transferredSaves}` saves to <@{targetId}>. `{deductedSaves}` saves have been deducted from your account.

You have `{savesLeft}` saves left.
commands.transfersave.error.noTargetSpec: You must specify a user to give a save to.
commands.transfersave.error.notEnoughSav: You need to have at least `1.5` saves in order to transfer.
commands.transfersave.error.cannotSelfTr: You cannot transfer saves to yourself!
commands.transfersave.error.targetHasMax: Target user already has maximum amount of saves!
commands.failrole.roleDisabledMessage: The fail role has been disabled.
commands.failrole.roleEnabledMessage: The fail role has been updated. ID: `{roleId}` | Role Name: `{roleName}`
commands.failrole.error.cannotApplyRole: Found role for `{arg}` but I don't have permissions to apply it. Try moving the role lower in the list.
commands.numbersonly.error.missingModeAr: <@{authorId}> You must specify a mode. Modes: `enable`, `disable`.
commands.vote.cannotVote:
❌ You have already voted.
You can vote again in **{hoursLeft:g} hours**.
commands.language.embedTitle: The bot language has been changed to `{arg}` in this guild.
commands.language.argumentMissing.embedD:
Use the corresponding language code in your command to set the bot language in this guild. `c!language [code]`
To help translate the bot into your language, see [here](https://github.com/tt2468/counting-translations/blob/main/README.md)
